// test my applet
establish_context
enable_trace
enable_timer
card_connect

// select
send_apdu -sc 0 -APDU 00A40400080102030405060809


// Scitani P + Q (dopadne uspesne)
send_apdu -sc 0 -APDU 800100002830CB127B63E42792F10F547B2C88266BB04F713B00202A9F0350144973255175A64859552F97C1291E;
// vysledek   0d6d833cc2c9c6834be7  2af4ddc13d1bad028744  30eb38e460b433db822a

// Scitani P + '0' (uspech)
send_apdu -sc 0 -APDU 800100002830CB127B63E42792F10F547B2C88266BB04F713B00000000000000000000000000000000000000001E;
// vysledek   30CB127B63E42792F10F  547B2C88266BB04F713B  00000000000000000001

// Scitani '0' + Q (uspech)
send_apdu -sc 0 -APDU 8001000028000000000000000000000000000000000000000000202A9F0350144973255175A64859552F97C1291E;
// vysledek   00202A9F035014497325  5175A64859552F97C129  00000000000000000001

// Scitani P + (-P) (uspech)
send_apdu -sc 0 -APDU 800100002830CB127B63E42792F10F547B2C88266BB04F713B30CB127B63E42792F10F64b03ef3458f97dd80341E;
// vysledek   00000000000000000001  00000000000000000001  00000000000000000000

// Doubling P + P (uspech)
send_apdu -sc 0 -APDU 800100002830CB127B63E42792F10F547B2C88266BB04F713B30CB127B63E42792F10F547B2C88266BB04F713B1E;
// vysledek   4ba4804fb1ac42a25f32  27783ae06deebd0bcfe7  30cb127b63e42792f10f




card_disconnect
release_context
